programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother becomes Stabler and Benson's prime suspect in the poisoning of her child; Novak enlists Clark's assistance in obtaining evidence to remove a judge from the bench after his bias in two child abuse cases leads to a wrongful arrest.

programme.title: Jurassic World Dominion
programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

programme.title: The McBee Dynasty: Real American Cowboys
programme.desc: Eldest brother Steven has a plan to save the farm from financial ruin, but younger brother Cole has his own idea on what's best.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 5, is abducted from his bed in the middle of the night, prompting detectives to take a hard look at the boy's estranged father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A standoff in a motel on the Jersey Shore incites a pedophile to take detective Benson hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the murder of a gay man who was the poster boy for sexual re-education.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a man's mutilation on the subway, detectives discover he has been abducting women for years and forcing them to live in his dungeon.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Capt. Cragen search for suspects after a missing infant is discovered badly beaten in the bushes at a local park.

The 118 has a day from hell with a never-ending series of bizarre emergency calls; a man tapes himself to a freeway billboard; a restaurant manager destroys his own business; Eddie feels a spark with Christopher's former teacher.

The members of the 118 rush to the site of a hit-and-run that leaves a familiar face in critical condition; with Buck's help, Athena investigates the case of a missing woman; Josh recalls an emergency in 2006 that led him to become a first responder.
When a famous mystery writer dies, Athena, Bobby and the 118 respond to the chaos caused by a citywide manhunt for buried treasure the author left behind.

The members of the 118 make calls to save a bridezilla at a disastrous wedding; Hen plays medical detective when her mother falls ill; Eddie and Christopher receive a visit from Carla; Athena uncovers a secret Bobby has been hiding.
Athena and the 118 are on high alert when a sniper is targeting members of the LAFD; Maddie makes a life decision.

A series of ransomware threats leads to emergencies for the 118, including a helicopter crash at a hospital and an air traffic control tower system failure; the case of the realtor serial rapist goes to trial.
The 118 springs into action when a citywide blackout and a record heat wave causes mayhem in Los Angeles; Chimney confides in Hen about Maddie's condition; Athena's worst nightmare comes true.

As the citywide blackout continues to cause mayhem in Los Angeles, Athena races to save her family from a tragedy; Eddie must make a difficult choice about his future; Maddie makes a life-changing decision.

A truck crashes into a high school homecoming parade; Athena and Michael try to help Harry in the aftermath of his kidnapping; May is intimidated by a returning call center legend; Bobby gives a devastated Chimney advice regarding Maddie.
A man over-exerts himself exercising; a groundskeeper is cut by his chainsaw; an explosion occurs at a retirement community; May gets an emergency call from a suicidal teen.
Responding to a fire at a prison, Bobby and the 118 find themselves trapped in a deadly riot.

programme.title: Jurassic World Dominion
programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.desc: Harry is brought in front of The Galactic Housing Council to answer for his crimes.

programme.desc: Harry is brought in front of The Galactic Housing Council to answer for his crimes.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry is brought in front of The Galactic Housing Council to answer for his crimes.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a San Diego woman who is near death arrives at an emergency room, the FBI and local law enforcement are called in to try to solve a medical mystery and a horrific crime.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman and mother of three is found shot in her office; the investigation into her death leaves a family divided.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The murder of a California mother beloved by four men reopens a mystery surrounding another young woman's death that occurred decades earlier.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The murder of a California mother beloved by four men reopens a mystery surrounding another young woman's death that occurred decades earlier.

A fire breaks out in an accountant's office and a car crashes into a "living funeral"; Athena is shocked when a suspect dies in her custody minutes after she arrests him; Buck is attracted to a death doula; Maddie and Chimney are audited by the IRS.

The 118 race to rescue two roommates desperately trying to find a needle in a haystack at a landfill, and help a woman whose nightmare dream suddenly becomes a painful reality; Athena and Maddie team up to find a missing boy in a crowded mall.

A wedding proposal tragically intersects with a bank robbery; a bride is literally stuck on her way to the altar; Athena talks a victim through her grief; Buck finds a surprise visitor on his doorstep.
A series of freeway car accidents leads to a catastrophic overpass collapse that endangers the lives of civilians and members of the 118.
Athena and Bobby set off on their honeymoon cruise, but when duty calls, their vacation is put on hold; a fighter jet traps a civilian; an unusual incident leaves a couple stuck together.

The disastrous cruise continues when Bobby and Athena respond to the ship's explosion, racing to aid injured passengers; Hen questions her instincts in a life-taking call and grows concerned about Athena and Bobby's whereabouts.

With each moment becoming critical as the ship flips upside down, Athena and Bobby take charge, seeking methods for rescue while navigating efforts to guide survivors to safety; Hen defies protocols in her search for Bobby and Athena.

programme.title: Hall Pass
programme.desc: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives for one week, they can do whatever they want.

programme.title: The Office
